channel.title: BIG Problem.. *Bigger Reward*
channel.description:
Recently, I discovered the 'RuneScape Blitz 2.75' Client.. This, easily looked to be the best server client I'd ever seen. - So I downloaded it.. Yeah, it took 3 hours.. But i was keen it'd work. After sitting here for 3 hours, thinking about how nice it'd be to play on this client, It finally finished. I opened the 'RunClient.bat' File, and this came up:
[code]Exception in "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Press any key to continue..[/code]
So, I extracted all the files to a new folder, and tried to Run it once again. It came up with this:
[code]'JAVA' Is not recognised as an Internal or External command, operable programme or Batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
[b][u]*The Rewards..*[/u][/b] [i]I've recently quit Real RuneScape, to get into Java Coding. As, I don't need my account anymore, I'm more than willingly prepared to give whoever can help me out, my account :) It is a lvl 99, With 88 Strength. He has good PK Stats, and I'm sure you'll love him.. All it takes, is for you, to help me with my problem.[/i]
DONT GIVE ME CRAP.. [i] Why? [/i] - Because I've already tried to download JDK 6.0 - Update 3, and what happend? Nothing. What happend why I tried the classpath, and path mothod? Nothing! I don't see, what the hell could've happened, About 3 hours ago my Client was working FINE.. Now, it comes up with this 'JAVA' Is not recognised as an internal or External command, programme or batch file? - Well, all it takes for you to do is get this problem sorted, and the reward is all yours :)
Thanks.

item.title: BIG Problem.. *Bigger Reward*
item.dc:creator: @firedude076 firedude076
item.description:
@firedude076 wrote:

go to http://java.com and check if you have java

Read full topic

item.title: BIG Problem.. *Bigger Reward*
item.dc:creator: @hybrent hybrent
item.description:
@hybrent wrote:

download solumstone compiler at solumstone.tkit auto sets emvironment variables which causes that error. Works for me, should work for you. ;D

Read full topic

item.title: BIG Problem.. *Bigger Reward*
item.dc:creator: @major492 major492
item.description:
@major492 wrote:

Ok follow these instructions

1)Download the latest jdk version 6.03
2)Edit The classpath and put this in CLASSPATH CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
3)Edit PATH as C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
4)Then go in your client and change the background and stuff
Then It Shoul be ok email me at zdredsoxx@yahoo.com if i get the acc

Read full topic

item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

you have to download JDK6u3 and set your variables…

item.description:
@Lord_Jayden wrote:

If someone, anyone ~ Could just Post a Helpful Mini-Tutorial on how this Problem would be fixed… I’d be VERY Thankful, And would be willing to reward you greatly.

Read full topic

item.title: BIG Problem.. *Bigger Reward*
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

On another topic

And… How would that be done…?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2007, 12:19:14 AM[/size][hr]Sorry, I’m extreemly new to clients other than Silabs… But recently all I’ve wanted is a client that LOOKS like RuneScape looks today. With the new Skill-Icons, and the New Inventory look… Etc… - So, if you could tell me how to edit the backround of my GlobalClient.V2.5 - OR At least give me the link to a Client that looks like RuneScape looks today, I’d be willing to reward you XD

If you don’t know about clients, don’t code them until you’ve learnt some.

Read full topic

item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

just edit the background sprite…

item.title: BIG Problem.. *Bigger Reward*
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Jayden Lord Jayden
item.description:
@Lord_Jayden wrote:

Recently, I discovered the ‘RuneScape Blitz 2.75’ Client… This, easily looked to be the best server client I’d ever seen. - So I downloaded it… Yeah, it took 3 hours… But i was keen it’d work.
After sitting here for 3 hours, thinking about how nice it’d be to play on this client, It finally finished. I opened the ‘RunClient.bat’ File, and this came up:

Exception in "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Press any key to continue..

So, I extracted all the files to a new folder, and tried to Run it once again.
It came up with this:

'JAVA' Is not recognised as an Internal or External command, operable programme or Batch file. Press any key to continue . . .

The Rewards…
I’ve recently quit Real RuneScape, to get into Java Coding. As, I don’t need my account anymore, I’m more than willingly prepared to give whoever can help me out, my account It is a lvl 99, With 88 Strength. He has good PK Stats, and I’m sure you’ll love him… All it takes, is for you, to help me with my problem.

DONT GIVE ME CRAP… Why? - Because I’ve already tried to download JDK 6.0 - Update 3, and what happend? Nothing. What happend why I tried the classpath, and path mothod? Nothing! I don’t see, what the hell could’ve happened, About 3 hours ago my Client was working FINE… Now, it comes up with this ‘JAVA’ Is not recognised as an internal or External command, programme or batch file? - Well, all it takes for you to do is get this problem sorted, and the reward is all yours

Thanks.

Read full topic
